docs.lead_paragraph: Productivity is an illusive concept. The largest corporations say they cannot measure it on their own production lines. Yet Government economists can chart it on an economy-wide basis.

headline.main: Lagging Productivity: Planners Are Stymied; Economic Analysis Productivity: Growth Lag Stymies Planners Problem Not Ignored

docs.abstract: analysis of lagging productivity; holds many econ planners are stymied Dy its cause; some possible reasons for growth lag outlined (M)
docs.snippet: Productivity is an illusive concept. The largest corporations say they cannot measure it on their own production lines. Yet Government economists can chart it on an economy-wide basis.
